remarks: Uniqueness of the foot point.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Feb-2020.)
statement:
isperp.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
isperp.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
isperp.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
isperp.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
isperp.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
isperp.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ran L ) $.
footne.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
footne.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
footne.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( X L Y ) ( perpG ` G ) A ) $.
footne $p |- ( ph -> -. Y e. A ) $.
